content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with current status: WORKING, Fuel: {'coal': 16}, Warnings: []

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with current status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: {'coal': 4}, Warnings: ['no ingredients to smelt']

### Iron Ore Resource
- Nearest iron ore resource located at position (x=-15.5, y=-50.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. This will prevent errors related to "no ingredients to smelt".

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
